titleStmt.title: The worlds wonder! or, The prophetical fish. Being a full description of this monster, its length & breadth with predictions on it. As it was taken by fisher-men in the port of Cucanga, neer the province and kingdom of China, in the year 1664. and sent to the emperour of Germany, and from thence convey'd to his Royal Majesty, the king of Greeat Brittain, &c. To the tune of, When stormy winds do blow.

The worlds wonder! or, The prophetical fish. Being a full description of this monster, its length & breadth with predictions on it. As it was taken by fisher-men in the port of Cucanga, neer the province and kingdom of China, in the year 1664. and sent to the emperour of Germany, and from thence convey'd to his Royal Majesty, the king of Greeat Brittain, &c. To the tune of, When stormy winds do blow.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. White at the Bible in GIltspur-street.,

notesStmt.note: Second leaf has separate imprint, and appears to belong to a different item.
Third leaf contains imprint, and has title: The second part, to the same tune.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
